content.title: Error: File already exists
content.body:
View details in Rollbar: [https://app.rollbar.com/a/thomas.iniguez/fix/item/FirstProject/7](https://app.rollbar.com/a/thomas.iniguez/fix/item/FirstProject/7)

```

Error: C:\Users\alpha\AppData\Roaming\youtube\views\index.ejs:File contents are the same
  File "C:\Users\alpha\youtube-public\src\index.js", line 38, in <unknown>
  File "C:\Users\alpha\youtube-public\node_modules\electron-log\src\core\Logger.js", line 178, in <unknown>
  File "<anonymous>", line unknown, in Array.reduce
  File "C:\Users\alpha\youtube-public\node_modules\electron-log\src\core\Logger.js", line 177, in Logger.processMessage
  File "C:\Users\alpha\youtube-public\node_modules\electron-log\src\core\Logger.js", line 136, in Logger.logData
  File "C:\Users\alpha\youtube-public\node_modules\electron-log\src\core\Logger.js", line 86, in <computed> [as error]
  File "C:\Users\alpha\youtube-public\src\index.js", line 365, in <unknown>
  File "node:internal/process/task_queues", line 95, in process.processTicksAndRejections
```
content.author: alphaleadership

acceptanceCriteria: The application should not throw an "Error: File already exists" when handling the file C:\Users\alpha\AppData\Roaming\youtube\views\index.ejs.

If the file C:\Users\alpha\AppData\Roaming\youtube\views\index.ejs already exists and its contents are identical to the content being written, the operation should complete without error or unnecessary overwrite.
If the file C:\Users\alpha\AppData\Roaming\youtube\views\index.ejs already exists but its contents are different, the application should successfully update the file.

details: The source code for 'C:\Users\alpha\youtube-public\src\index.js' (where the error originates) is not provided in the current project structure. This code is crucial for understanding the file write logic causing the error.
